articles.description: Mrs Hinch fans have shared a 'magic spray' that is amazing for getting rid of mould and mildew in window frames – and it currently only costs 95p at Wilko
articles.content:
Mould is wreaking havoc in British homes this winter. Plummeting outside temperatures are causing condensation to form on windows, which can lead to mould if left untreated.
 Luckily, there are thin… [+2334 chars]
